member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.MarginLeft
member.summary: Value of left margin - default is 0

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.MarginRight
member.summary: Value of right margin - default is 0

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.MarginTop
member.summary: Value of top margin - default is 0

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.MarginBottom
member.summary: Value of bottom margin - default is 0

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.UseGrayscale
member.summary: true to generate PDF in grayscale, false or leave blank for full colour

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.UseLandscape
member.summary: true to rotate page to landscape, false or leave blank for portrait

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.EnableForms
member.summary: true to turn html form fields into pdf form fields

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.LowQuality
member.summary: true to reduce the quality, which may lower your network usage if quality is still satisfactory

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.ImageQuality
member.summary: override the default image quality percentage (94) and use your own

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.DisableShrinking
member.summary: true to disable the intelligent shrinking process we use make the pixel/dpi ratio constant

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.DisableJavascript
member.summary: true to disable running JS on page, otherwise javascript runs

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.JavascriptDelay
member.summary: Milliseconds to wait for JS to finish executing before converting the page. Useful for ajax calls.

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.UsePrintStylesheet
member.summary: true to use the print media stylesheet, false or leave blank to use normal stylesheet

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.FooterSpacing
member.summary: Spacing between the header and the content in mm - default is 0

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.HeaderSpacing
member.summary: Spacing between the footer and the content in mm - default is 0

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.PageSize
member.summary: Default size is A4 but you can use Letter, A0, A2, A3, A5, Legal, etc.

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.PageWidth
member.summary: Page width - if you use this, you must also use PageWidth

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.PageHeight
member.summary: Page height - if you use this, you must also use PageHeight

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.ViewPort
member.summary: e.g. 800x600 - Set if you have custom scrollbars or css attribute overflow to emulate window size

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.Dpi
member.summary: Explicitly set the DPI, which is 96 by default. Also see Zoom settings

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.Zoom
member.summary: Default zoom is 1.00 You can use any floating point number, e.g. 0.5, 0.75, 1.10, 2.55, 3...

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.OutputFormat
member.summary: Must be either "pdf", "jpg", "png", "bmp" or "svg" if not supplied the default is PDF

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.FileName
member.summary: Optionally the name you want the file to be called when downloading or $unique$ for guid

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.Username
member.summary: For URL conversions, creates a secure basic authentication connection to your server

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.Password
member.summary: For URL conversions, creates a secure basic authentication connection to your server

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.Cookie
member.summary: Supply in format: NAME|||VALUE|||NAME|||VALUE (that's 2 cookies). Often used for authentication.

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.HeaderHtml
member.summary: To use a html header on each page - a string starting with <DOCTYPE html>

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.FooterHtml
member.summary: To use a html footer on each page - a string starting with <DOCTYPE html>

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.HeaderUrl
member.summary: To use a html header on each page - a url starting with http containing the html

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.FooterUrl
member.summary: To use a html footer on each page - a url starting with http containing the html

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.HeaderLeft
member.summary: Top left header text (can use replacement tags below)

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.HeaderRight
member.summary: Top right header text (can use replacement tags below)

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.FooterLeft
member.summary: Bottom left footer (can use replacement tags below)

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.FooterRight
member.summary: Bottom right footer (can use replacement tags below)

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.FooterFontName
member.summary: Footer font names - Arial by default

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.HeaderFontName
member.summary: Header font names - Arial by default

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.FooterFontSize
member.summary: The font sizes - 12 by default. Use the the plain value (do not use px or pt)

member.name: P:LeanCode.PdfRocket.PdfOptions.HeaderFontSize
member.summary: The font sizes - 12 by default. Use the the plain value (do not use px or pt)
